page.title: 14My School Day
page.content: A typical school day for me would be to get up at 7.00 and about 7.30 I would have my breakfast.I would have Co Co Pops and a drink of tea.Then at about 8.30 I take my next door neighbour Donna to school which starts at 9.00.We work till 10.40 then we go out to play.We come in at 11.00 and then we do maths and painting.Then at 12.15 we have lunch.We come back in at 1.15.Then we do topic and P.E.Then at 2.20 we have another playtime until 2.40.Then we can choose what we want to do till 3.15 when we go home.At home I get changed and go and play with Tammi until 5.00 when I have my tea.After tea I watch a video till 8.30 when I go to bed.This is a day in my education.
